definition-item.definition-title: MECHANICAL OR PRESSURE CLEANING OF CARPETS, RUGS, SACKS, HIDES, OR OTHER SKIN OR TEXTILE ARTICLES OR FABRICS; TURNING INSIDE-OUT FLEXIBLE TUBULAR OR OTHER HOLLOW ARTICLES

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods or devices for mechanical or pressure cleaning of textile articles or fabrics.
Methods or devices for turning inside-out tubular or other hollow textile articles.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mechanical preparation or mechanical treatment of bed feathers

definition-item.definition-title: Beating, brushing, or otherwise mechanically cleaning or pressure cleaning carpets, rugs, sacks, hides, or other skin or textile articles or fabrics

table-column.paragraph-text: Cleaning devices for sheets or webs in connection with printing
Cleaning devices for sheets or webs in connection with printing

definition-item.definition-title: Turning inside-out flexible tubular or other hollow articles (in combination with inspecting D06H3/16 {; turning tubes inside out in the shaping joining of plastics or shaping of substances in a plastic state B29C67/0018})

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Flexible tubular or other hollow articles

definition-item.definition-title: Mechanical, vacuum, or pressure cleaning in combination with the turning inside-out of flexible tubular or other hollow articles

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Flexible tubular or other hollow articles
